document_data.caption: A map showing the Three Tors near Aithelar.
document_data.name: the Three Tors
document_data.mainbody: The '''Three Tors''' was a rock formation found near [[Aithelar]] in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on [[Alaron]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].
document_data.Geography: The Three Tors were found just south of Aithelar along the southern edge of the [[Southflow Marsh]]. The rocky hills formed a small diagonal barrier extending inland from the coast of the [[Sea of Moonshae]].
